author: psharples
msg: The call widget.getWidgetTitle() can sometimes contain a span html tag, which upsets the jquery UI in this page and makes it fail. Substituted an empty string in the code until fixed properly (we need to parse the result before sending it to jscript). SEE WOOKIE-178.
